text: Schizo may refer to: == Films == * Schizo (1976 film), a 1976 horror film * The Recruiter (2004 film) or Schizo, a 2004 Russian-language film * The Psychopath or Schizo, a 1966 British horror film == Other uses == * a slang term for a schizophrenic * Schizo, a mixtape by American rapper Dreezy * Schizo, a series of cartoons by Ivan Brunetti == See also == * The Schizo's, a Dutch punk rock band * Crazyhouse, a form of chess also known as schizo-chess * Schizophrenia (disambiguation) * *
title: Schizo
